review: Sling TV and Netflix is all a girl needs.  The buffering I was experiencing with the Fire Stick is almost completely gone.  It only happens when two people are in the house streaming at the same time.  When I'm home alone I've seen no issues with it.  I wish the voice command worked inside the apps.  It only works within the Fire TV environment.
